Mod2_Description: {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to enemies that are Slowed, Stunned or {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}. These damage bonuses can stack.
Mod1_Description: {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} becomes a {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skill and, instead of exploding, releases a vile miasma dealing {c_number}{dot:MIASMA_DOT_TOOLTIP}{/c} Shadow Damage over {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.
name: Corpse Explosion
